reviewText:
It's a waste of your time and money.

From a "Christian" website: "In "Darwin's Life and Legacy," Sharp explores the ramifications of Darwinian philosophy while strolling the beaches at Normandy, commenting on the fact that 20th century figures like Adolf Hitler justified their actions in part because of the "survival of the fittest" concept introduced by Darwin and his contemporaries (such as Herbert Spencer)."

This should be rated R16 - not for children.
